parentProduct.title: Clinical Data Acquisition Standards Harmonization Model Version 1.2
Clinical Data Acquisition Standards Harmonization Model Version 1.2

cdashModelFields.definition: The identifier for a single associated person, a group of associated persons, or a pool of associated persons.
cdashModelFields.label: Associated Persons Identifier
cdashModelFields.mappingInstructions: Maps directly to the SDTM variable listed in the SDTM Target column.
cdashModelFields.name: APID
cdashModelFields.prompt: [Associated Person's/Group of Associated Persons/Pool of associated persons] Identifier
cdashModelFields.questionText: What is the [associated person's/group of associated persons/pool of associated persons] identifier?

parentProduct.title: Clinical Data Acquisition Standards Harmonization Model Version 1.2

cdashModelFields.definition: The identifier for the study subject/participant.
cdashModelFields.implementationNotes: This may be derived/populated from the study subject's identifier as recorded on the subject Demographics CRF.
cdashModelFields.label: Related Subject or Pool Identifier
cdashModelFields.mappingInstructions: Maps directly to the SDTM variable listed in the SDTM Target column.
cdashModelFields.name: RSUBJID

parentProduct.title: Clinical Data Acquisition Standards Harmonization Model Version 1.2

cdashModelFields.definition: The Identifier for a related device
cdashModelFields.implementationNotes: RDEVID will be populated with the SPDEVID of the related device
cdashModelFields.label: Related Device Identifier
cdashModelFields.mappingInstructions: Maps directly to the SDTM variable listed in the SDTM Target column.
cdashModelFields.name: RDEVID
cdashModelFields.questionText: What is the identifier for the related device?

codelist.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C100130

parentProduct.title: Clinical Data Acquisition Standards Harmonization Model Version 1.2

cdashModelFields.definition: The Identifier for a related subject or pool of subjects.
cdashModelFields.implementationNotes: If RSUBJID is populated, describes the relationship of the associated person(s) identified in APID to the subject or pool identified in RSUBJID. \n If RDEVID is populated, describes the relationship of the associated person(s) identified in APID to the subject or pool identified in RDEVID. \n If RSUBJID and RDEVID are null, SREL describes the relationship of the associated person(s) identified in APID to the study identified in STUDYID.
cdashModelFields.label: Subject, Device, or Study Relationship
cdashModelFields.mappingInstructions: Maps directly to the SDTM variable listed in the SDTM Target column.
cdashModelFields.name: SREL
cdashModelFields.questionText: What is the associated person's relationship to the (study) [subject/participant]?
